title: (x) balance - blocky serif - Alexandria {Rainer}
content:
Here is another font that I am having trouble with

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014248im_/http:/typophile.com/files/matter_4110.jpg)
author: vector

comments.content: Hmm, but the M doesn't match.
Isn't that a knockoff of City? Same problem with the M and other small details. I wonder if this font is not a cheap knockoff of etiher?

Square Slabserif is commonly known as Berthold’s »City«.

The sample above looks like a squooshed [Alexandria](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014248/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=alexandria&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=Matter+of+Balance&nb_ppp=50&af=on&psize=m&classt=alpha) by Hank Gilette.
Thanks that appears to be it
